item.title: Blocked gutter drain, 28th January
item.description:
This storm drain is completely blocked and as it’s on a hill we get pooling water at the bottom.

item.title: Litter all down McNeil Road, 28th January
item.description:
I raised this before and it was closed without addressing. All the grassy areas by the railway on McNeil Road are full of litter. The substation is also full of flytipping. It is extremely unsightly and has been like this for months. Please can the grassy areas and the substation be cleared of litter? Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Lyndhurst Grove, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
